search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Paid Memberships Pro (paid-memberships-pro-wordpress-p.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Paid Memberships Pro can be found at: https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
[Skip to content](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/pricing#content)

Choose a Plan to Start Your Membership Site Today
-------------------------------------------------

100 day money back guarantee — no questions asked.

Lifetime
--------

$3,000

Pay once. Enjoy PMPro Plus for life. [Learn more](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/lifetime/)

*   **Everything in Plus, with:**
*   Lifetime use on 2 sites
*   Lifetime of no renewal payments
*   Lifetime access to all PMPro software
*   Lifetime software updates
*   Lifetime access to new products
*   Lifetime of friendly helpful support

Most Popular

Plus
----

~normally $597/ year~

$299/ year

Best for building advanced membership sites

*   **Everything in Standard, plus:**
*   2 site license
*   Priority support
*   Accept donations
*   Invite only membership
*   Member approvals
*   Member directory & user profiles
*   Multisite & WordPress Network features
*   Payment plans by level
*   Prorated pricing
*   Recover abandoned carts
*   Sell gift memberships
*   Series/content drip-feed
*   Sponsored or group accounts
*   Variable "pay what you want" pricing

[\+ 32 Plus Add Ons](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/pricing#featuresAll)

Standard
--------

~normally $347/ year~

$174/ year

Best for beginners and DIY membership sites

*   **Everything in Free, plus:**
*   1 site license
*   Premium support
*   Memberlite theme support
*   Advanced customization recipes
*   Automatic updates
*   Affiliate tracking
*   Protect custom post types
*   Email confirmation
*   Membership cards
*   Mailing address
*   Google Analytics + Ecommerce Tracking

[\+ 23 Standard Add Ons](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/pricing#featuresAll)

Free
----

$0

The core plugin and 29 free Add Ons free forever

*   **The entire core plugin, with:**
*   Unlimited restricted content
*   Unlimited membership levels & members
*   Free or paid registration
*   Multiple memberships per user
*   Recurring subscriptions
*   All gateways, including Stripe, PayPal, & more
*   All email marketing integrations
*   Memberlite theme
*   bbPress, BuddyPress, BuddyBoss integrations
*   Courses & LMS integrations
*   Frontend login
*   No-code user profile fields
*   Restrict access to WordPress dashboard
*   WooCommerce integration
*   Zapier integration

[\+ 26 Free Add Ons](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/pricing#featuresAll)

All renewals are at full price. You can change plans or cancel your account at any time.

Not sure which plan to pick? [Choose Plus Membership](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/membership-checkout/?level=20) to get everything you need for an advanced membership site. Or [try things out for free](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/membership-checkout/?level=7).

The Membership Platform That Everyone Loves
-------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Over 100,000 Active Sites](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/images/active-installs-icon.png)

90,000+ Active Sites

![Image 2: Over 15 Years In Development](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/images/trusted-development-icon.png)

15 Years in Development

![Image 3: Over 390 5 Star Ratings](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/images/star-rating-icon.png)

470+ 5-Star Ratings

Recommended by top content creators, communities, coaches, educators, podcasters, and more.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Rating: 5 out of 5

  

**I highly recommend it!**  
After trying a bunch of different solutions for my online course membership, it became pretty obvious that Paid Memberships Pro was the best choice.

PMPro provides a winning combination: Ease of use and flexibility to create features that I didn’t see in any other membership plugin or platform.

 

Rating: 5 out of 5

  

**Excellent Product, Fantastic Support, Perfect with BuddyBoss**  
We migrated away from expensive SaaS products and settled on PMPro as our membership tool. As an association of more than 4,000 members, we wanted an elegant solution that would allow us to restrict content, manage memberships, and integrate with a variety of other WordPress plugins for Events, CRM, and LMS.

The migration was easy and doing custom dev has been smooth and seamless.

 

Rating: 5 out of 5

  

**PMPro is the best way to protect your content and provide a smooth experience for your users.** We are a yoga video streaming company that offers monthly and annual memberships. Our customer base has grown 10x thanks to the membership power and versatility of PMPro. It was a breeze to integrate PMPro with the dozens of official and third-party Add Ons.

![Image 4: 100% Money Back Guarantee](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/images/money-back-guarantee.png)

Try Our Premium Plans Risk Free.
--------------------------------

Your purchase is backed by a 100 day money-back guarantee.

If you decide not to use your premium plan, request a full refund—no questions asked. [Refund requests can be made through our contact form](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/contact/).

Even if your request comes after 100 days, we will still refund your payment by any means necessary.

_Kim and Jason Coleman, Co-Founders of Paid Memberships Pro_

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

****How many sites can I use Paid Memberships Pro on?****

As many as you want. Paid Memberships Pro is 100% open source – there is no limit on how many sites you can use our plugin on. A PMPro License is required for automatic updates for our Standard and Plus Add Ons. A Standard license key can be used on 1 site, a Plus license key can be used on 2 sites. [Contact us](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/contact/) if you are interested in using a single license on more than 2 sites.

**How does PMPro compare to other membership plugins for WordPress?**

Our free plan is better than everyone else’s paid plan. Unlike other plugins that charge for the software and include support for free, we make our software available to everyone at no cost. Our paid plans add services and expert support to help you build a successful membership site. We are fully committed to open source and continuously invest in improving our software. Our support team goes beyond quick replies—we take the time to provide real solutions and respond within one business day. View our [Product Comparison blog posts](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/category/product-comparison/).

**If the software is free, how does PMPro make money?**

We have paid plans that include automatic updates, premium support, and exclusive members-only content. If you are wondering how we can sustain a free product, the answer is that we have been in business and profitable for over 15 years, continuously improving PMPro and supporting thousands of membership sites. Our business model ensures we can keep offering a free version while also providing premium options.

****Which plan should I choose?****

We currently offer three plans: Free, Standard, and Plus. Each is tailored to different needs, from membership site beginners to individual business owners to web developers and agencies. We put together a [full guide on selecting the right plan based on your membership site needs](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/paid-memberships-pro-plans/). If your needs change in the future, you can upgrade at any time. Nothing will change with your site settings, content, user and member information, or subscriptions.

****How much support can I expect to receive?****

We provide very deep support and are able to troubleshoot most issues via the support forums. Some custom code is straight forward, and we can assist with writing the code and instructing you on exactly where to put it. If you have found a tutorial on our site about a customization, we can usually help you to set that customization up or tweak it in small ways.

****Does Paid Memberships Pro do \[this special thing\]?****

If you have questions about a specific feature or requirement, [use our contact form for pre-sales questions](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/contact/). If you purchase now to ask in our support forums, and we are not able to give you the direction you need, you can ask for a refund within 30 days.

****Does your plugin include integration for \[my preferred payment gateway\]?****

[View our gateway documentation](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/gateway/) to see which gateways are included in the core plugin. There are also [several additional gateways available as free plugins](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/add-on-category/payment/) listed in our Add Ons page. Developing a new gateway plugin is a large undertaking. [This page includes a general guide](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/gateway/adding-a-new-gateway/) to developing a new gateway and is meant for experienced developers. We are not currently taking on any new gateway development work, but we will support other developers who are working on gateway integrations via the support area or in Slack.

**Do I need to know any coding to use this plugin?**

No, Paid Memberships Pro does not require any coding knowledge. The plugin is designed to meet all levels of WordPress experience. At the same time, our plugin is very developer-friendly and extendible.

****What happens if I do not renew (once my membership expires)?****

Membership is valid for one year from purchase date. If your membership expires you will lose access to the support forum and any premium videos, tutorials, and code recipes. The core Paid Memberships Pro plugin and all Add Ons already installed will continue to work. The core Paid Memberships Pro plugin and other Add Ons we host in the WordPress.org repository can still be updated through the WordPress dashboard, but your License Key will not allow installation or updates to premium Add Ons.

****Can I purchase Add Ons individually?****

Add Ons cannot be purchased individually. We designed these plans through our experience supporting thousands of membership sites on this platform for the over 10 years. As a fully open source WordPress plugin, you can [use our code for free](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/free/) if you cannot afford a membership or are just testing.

****What if I have unique requirements and need more help?****

Some customizations are so unique that you may need a developer. In cases where our support team cannot code a feature just for you, we will answer specific technical questions and provide broad guidance on how certain things could be developed. You should share this information with your developer or invite them to handle your support ticket. [You can find a developer here](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/developers/).

****I’m a developer. Can I use my PMPro License key on client sites?****

You are free to use your license key on client sites. However, we advise developers to encourage each client to purchase their own plan. This allows clients to have access to the support forums and receive ongoing updates. In our experience, each site having a unique license key and support membership benefits both the site owner and the developer. This protects you if you need to cancel your own license in the future, want to end a relationship with a client, or if one of your clients shares your key and it gets flagged for abuse.

****My theme included Paid Memberships Pro. How do I get support?****

Our core plugin is 100% free and open source. Your theme author has decided to bundle our plugin in your theme download, but this does not include a support membership or access to our Add Ons. You must purchase a support membership that includes a license key in order to get support or access premium Add Ons.

  

**Recommended by top influencers, users, and web hosts**

Plugin Reviews

4.3 out of 5

![Image 5: G2](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/G2-150x150.png)

4.8 out of 5

![Image 6: Capterra](https://www.paidmembershipspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Capterra-300x67.png)

5 out of 5

Pricing and plans for Paid Memberships Pro. Start, manage, and grow your subscription business with our WordPress membership plugin.
